---
title: "The IRW Data Standard"
---

description of the data standard

Key Elements of the standard

- `id` This is a persistent identifer for *the thing being measured*. This wlil typically be a person but in some cases may be, for example, a word (when interest is in establishing some property of the word).

- `item` This is a persistent identifier for *the probe being used to measure*. [note that there are issues associated with trials]

- `resp`

Other elements

- wave/observation

- time

- date

- Qmatrix

- rater


Additional Considerations

- trials

- process data
